DocWhereRule.Name: ApplicableSurface
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The geometry used in the definition of the face shall be restricted. The face geometry shall be an _IfcElementarySurface_, _IfcSweptSurface_, or _IfcBSplineSurface_.

DocWhereRule.Name: RequiresEdgeCurve
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The geometry of all bounding edges of the face shall be fully defined as _IfcEdgeCurve_'s.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (ElpFbnds <* QUERY (Bnds <* SELF\IfcFace.Bounds | 'IFCTOPOLOGYRESOURCE.IFCEDGELOOP' IN TYPEOF(Bnds.Bound)) | NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (Oe <* ElpFbnds.Bound\IfcEdgeLoop.EdgeList | NOT('IFCTOPOLOGYRESOURCE.IFCEDGECURVE' IN TYPEOF(Oe\IfcOrientedEdge.EdgeElement) ))) = 0 ))) = 0

DocWhereRule.Name: ApplicableEdgeCurves
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The types of curve used to define the geometry of edges shall be restricted to _IfcLine_, _IfcConic_, _IfcPolyline_, or _IfcBSplineCurve_.
DocWhereRule.Expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (ElpFbnds <* QUERY (Bnds <* SELF\IfcFace.Bounds | 'IFCTOPOLOGYRESOURCE.IFCEDGELOOP' IN TYPEOF(Bnds.Bound)) | NOT (SIZEOF (QUERY (Oe <* ElpFbnds.Bound\IfcEdgeLoop.EdgeList | NOT (SIZEOF (['IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCLINE', 'IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCCONIC', 'IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCPOLYLINE', 'IFCGEOMETRYRESOURCE.IFCBSPLINECURVE'] * TYPEOF(Oe\IfcOrientedEdge.EdgeElement\IfcEdgeCurve.EdgeGeometry)) = 1 ) )) = 0 ))) = 0
